game.name: Flipping Phantom
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Flip your way through this jump-less 2D platformer. As a ghost, navigate through the maze-like levels by phasing into the floor, reversing gravity, and controlling your fall speed with your float ability in order to avoid spooky obstacles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Flip your way through this jump-less 2D platformer. As a ghost, navigate through the maze-like levels by phasing into the floor, reversing gravity, and controlling your fall speed with your float ability in order to avoid spooky obstacles.
